div.p: RESTORATION the ſame with reſtauration. See

In England, the return of king Charles II. in 1660, is, by way of eminence, called the Reβoration ; and the 29th of May is kept as an anniverſary feſtival, in com-memoration of that event, by which the regal and epiſ-∙copal government was reſtpred.
